fr.iut.orderProvider

Class OrderProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.iut.orderProvider.OrderProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IVocalOrder

    public class OrderProvider
extends java.lang.Object
implements IVocalOrder
    A little Simplifier which permit to remove words if the function is activated
    If not activated, the Simplifier is used as an interface between Voce/Sphinx4
    and a program that wish extends its controls with vocal orders
    Author:
    Michel
